Keto Facts

vegan Facts

By now you may have heard about the famed “Seafood Tower” at Crossroads Kitchen, an all-vegan restaurant in Los Angeles. While the tower spotlights vegan versions of several traditional seafood dishes, the star of the show is most certainly the Tempura Battered Lobster Mushrooms. With a natural seafood-like flavor, these make for the perfect lobster substitute. According to owner Tal Ronnen, they also served as inspiration for the tower itself.
